summary.description:
Today, more moisture-laden rainfall (up 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 226 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 942 m), rainfall (down 0.1 mm), feels like temperature (up 1.7°C), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 225.7m lower than yesterday, 61.1m lower than the past week, 941.9m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 745m and a peak of 3580m, averaging 1760.7m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. Periods of rain anticipated, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
